trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that exposes an element to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base que expõe um elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application about an element, the root returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer for that element.
trans-unit.target: Quando [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] consulta a raiz de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] devolve a raiz de aplicação sobre um elemento, o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] ponto a ponto para esse elemento.

trans-unit.source: The peer also responds to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries about its corresponding element.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de rede também responde a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] consultas sobre o respetivo elemento correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when they are called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a inicialização para os valores de classe base quando são denominados pelo construtor de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is reported to the automation client as a source for all the events that come from this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> que é reportado para o cliente de automatização como uma origem para todos os eventos provenientes isto <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is the source of events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> que é a origem de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o acelerador combinações de teclas do elemento que se encontra associado a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: A chave de acelerador.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>

trans-unit.source: If an application responds to keyboard events to provide shortcut key behavior, it should return a string that contains the keyboard shortcut combination.
trans-unit.target: Se uma aplicação responder a eventos de teclado para fornecer o comportamento de chave de atalho, deverá devolver uma cadeia que contém a combinação de atalho de teclado.

trans-unit.source: For example, for an element that can copy text to the clipboard, this attached property might be set to the value "CTRL+C".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para um elemento que pode copiar o texto para a área de transferência, esta propriedade anexada pode ser definida como o valor "CTRL + C".

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: A chave de acelerador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave de acesso para o elemento que estão associado com o ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que contém a chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: An access key (sometimes referred to as a keyboard shortcut or mnemonic) is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that invokes the associated menu function.
trans-unit.target: Uma chave de acesso (por vezes referida como um atalho de teclado ou mnemónica ser exigido) é um caráter no texto de um menu, item de menu ou uma etiqueta de um controlo como um botão que invoca a função do menu associada.

trans-unit.source: For example, to provide a shortcut way to open the `File` menu (for which the access key is typically F), an element might have this attached property set to "ALT+F".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para fornecer uma forma de atalho para abrir o `File` menu (para que a chave de acesso é, geralmente, F), um elemento pode ter esta propriedade anexada definida para "ALT + F".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que contém a chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controlo do elemento que se encontra associado a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de controlo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*> of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*>do elemento que estão associado com o ponto de automatização.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor do identificador de automatização é o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não for definida, o valor é o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor do identificador de automatização é o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não for definida, o valor é o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que contém o identificador de mensagens em fila.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> object that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> objeto que representa as coordenadas de ecrã do elemento que estão associados com o ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of GetChildren elements that are represented in the UI Automation tree as immediate child elements of the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos de GetChildren que são representados na árvore de automatização de IU como elementos subordinados imediata do elemento de automatização.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that is used with <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>, to differentiate the control that is represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um nome que é utilizado com <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref>, para diferenciar o controlo que é representado por este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> on the element that is associated with the automation peer that responds to a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> no elemento que estão associado com o ponto de automatização que responde a um rato, clique em.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element represents a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, a clickable point is any point in the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that issues the command that the button represents when it is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento representa um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, um ponto clicável é qualquer ponto na área de cliente visível do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que emite o comando que representa o botão quando clica com o rato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: A point in the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto clicável área do elemento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: A point within the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto dentro da área de clicável do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the functionality of the control that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto que descreve as funcionalidades do controlo que estão associado com o ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: The returned string typically provides the same text that is provided by the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia devolvida normalmente fornece o mesmo texto que é fornecido pela descrição para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: O texto de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: O texto de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: Tells [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] where in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree to place the <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> being hosted by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Indica [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] onde no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore colocar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> que está a ser alojada por um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted `hwnd` to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host `hwnd` objects.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve o alojada `hwnd` para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para controla que alojam `hwnd` objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must override this method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>que está associado um elemento que aloja imediatamente um `hwnd` tem de substituir este método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: If this method is not overridden, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] places the `hwnd` as a child element of the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> that hosts the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Se este método não é substituído, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] coloca o `hwnd` como um elemento subordinado do <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>que aloja a toda a aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you want to override this default behavior and set [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to position the hosted `hwnd` parallel to the place where it is located in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, pretende substituir este comportamento predefinido e definir [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para posicionar o alojada `hwnd` paralela para o local onde está localizado no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] árvore lógica.

trans-unit.source: Except in hosting scenarios, do not allow <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types to override this method.
trans-unit.target: Exceto em cenários de alojamento, não permitir <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>tipos para substituir este método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: In addition to overriding this method, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types that are associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must return the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is cast to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> in response to WM_GETOBJECT coming to the hosted `hwnd`.
trans-unit.target: Além de substituir este método, o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>tipos que estão associados um elemento que aloja imediatamente um `hwnd` tem de devolver o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>que é convertido <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>em resposta a WM_GETOBJECT proveniente para o alojada `hwnd`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: To get a pointer to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um ponteiro para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>, chamar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve o alojada <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para controla que alojam <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that conveys the visual status of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto que transmite o estado visual do elemento que está associado este ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact might be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o estado de um contacto messenger pode ser "Ocupado" ou "Online".

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: O estado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: O estado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes what kind of item an object represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que descreve o tipo de item num objeto representa.

trans-unit.source: Examples of the returned string are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Exemplos da cadeia devolvido são "Mensagem de correio", "Contacte" e "Documento".

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de item.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de item.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> que é direcionada para o elemento.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the GetLabeledBy method gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>controlo, o método GetLabeledBy obtém <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>que está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: In the following image, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> "Themes" is targeted to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>; therefore the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> also targets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Na imagem seguinte, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>"Temas" estão direcionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>por conseguinte o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>destina-se também <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses **ALT**+**T**, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> gets focus instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador premir **ALT**+**T**, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>obtém o foco em vez de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ![Display properties shows labeled by usage](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "Display properties shows labeled by usage") The GetLabeledBy method for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> for the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: ![Propriedades de ecrã mostra identificados pela utilização](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "propriedades de ecrã mostra identificados pela utilização") GetLabeledBy o método para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer>devolve <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> correspondente</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: This enables an automation client to get the text string that describes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que um cliente de automatização obter a cadeia de texto que descreve o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> do elemento que é o destino de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> do elemento que é o destino de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable localized string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> value for the control that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia localizada legível por humanos que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valor para o controlo que está associado este ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de controlo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto que descreve o elemento que está associado este ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the derived implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama a implementação derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name.
trans-unit.target: O nome.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: You can think of this value as a string that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Pode considerar como uma cadeia que os utilizadores utilizam para explicar o controlo estão que faça referência a este valor.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by tools such as Narrator to tell the user what the control is.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada por ferramentas como o Narrador para indicar ao utilizador que é o controlo.

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with a string "OK" should return "OK".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um botão com uma cadeia de "OK" deverá devolver "OK".

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control that lets users select a color might return "Colors".
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>controlo que permite que os utilizadores, selecione a cor poderá devolver "Cores".</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you have assigned a name to all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that accessibility tools such as screen readers can refer to each control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que atribuiu um nome para todos os controlos de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para que as ferramentas de acessibilidade, como leitores de ecrã podem fazer referência a cada controlo de forma localizada.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que contém a etiqueta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the explicit control orientation, if any.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica a orientação do controlo explícito, se aplicável.

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: A orientação do controlo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: A orientação do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is the parent of this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> que é o principal deste <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parent automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de rede para a automatização de principal.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o padrão de controlo que está associado especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The object that implements the pattern interface; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this peer does not support this interface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que implementa a interface de padrão; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se este elemento não suporta esta interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> do ponto de especificado.

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: A posição no ecrã para obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> do.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> o momento especificado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: A posição no ecrã para obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> do.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> o momento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer currently has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que está atualmente associado a este ponto de automatização tem o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento tem o foco do teclado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento tem o foco do teclado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Triggers recalculation of the main properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> and raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> notification to the Automation Client if the properties changed.
trans-unit.target: Aciona novo cálculo das propriedades do principais a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> e gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>notificação para o cliente de automatização, se alterar as propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: Examples of main properties include, but are not limited to, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de propriedades principais incluem, mas não estarem limitados aos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, updates and notifications happen automatically after the update of the layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, as atualizações e notificações automático após a atualização do esquema do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: (The update occurs in response to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.) Sometimes, however, properties change without raising the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: (A atualização ocorre em resposta ao <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>eventos.)</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> Por vezes, no entanto, as propriedades alterar sem que gera o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the whole <xref:System.Windows.Window> moves, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando o inteiro <xref:System.Windows.Window>movido, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>o evento não é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: In this example, the set of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> objects change because the objects are expressed in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>objetos alterar porque os objetos são expressas em coordenadas do ecrã.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> must call InvalidatePeer on its peer on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, a <xref:System.Windows.Window>tem de chamar InvalidatePeer no respetivo elemento <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que está associado este ponto de automatização contém dados que são apresentados ao utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A content element contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de conteúdo contém dados que são apresentados ao utilizador.

trans-unit.source: An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button in a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de um elemento de conteúdo é um item numa caixa de lista ou um botão numa caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: You typically use non-content elements (which are also referred to as peripheral elements) to work with the content in a composite control.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente utiliza os elementos de conteúdo não (que são também conhecidos como elementos periféricos) para trabalhar com o conteúdo de um controlo composto.

trans-unit.source: An example of a non-content element is the button in a drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de um elemento de conteúdo não é o botão num controlo de lista pendente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento é um elemento de conteúdo caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento é um elemento de conteúdo caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element is understood by the user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento seja compreendido pelo utilizador como interativo ou contribuir para a estrutura lógica do controlo no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento é um controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento é um controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element associated with this automation peer supports interaction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento associado este ponto de automatização suporta interação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element supports interaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento suporta interação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o ponto de automatização pode receber e enviar eventos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que está associado a este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> anfitriões <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""> </xref> no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Two examples of elements that host `hwnds` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Dois exemplos de elementos que alojam `hwnds` no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] são <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: These peers must also override <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Estes elementos também tem de substituir <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento que está associado a este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> anfitriões <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""> </xref> no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento pode aceitar o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento pode aceitar o foco do teclado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento pode aceitar o foco do teclado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an element is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um elemento está fora do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade indica se o elemento está visível.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: Em algumas circunstâncias, um elemento está no ecrã, mas é ainda não estão visível.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento está no ecrã mas obscured por outros elementos, poderá não estar visível.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o método devolve `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento não está no ecrã; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento não está no ecrã; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element contains sensitive content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento contém conteúdo confidencial.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element contains sensitive content such as a password; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento contém conteúdo confidencial, tais como uma palavra-passe; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element contains sensitive content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento contém conteúdo confidencial; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this peer must be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que está associado este elemento tem de ser concluído num formulário.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element must be completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento tem de ser concluído; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is must be completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento têm de ser concluídas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the specified event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] está à escuta para o evento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you call this method before creating the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, chamar este método antes de criar o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>que desencadeia o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: This method is a performance measure because if [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] does not listen for the event, it does not make sense to create a peer to raise one.
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma medida de desempenho, porque se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] escutar para o evento não fazer sentido para criar um elemento de rede para elevar um.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is static and only answers if a delegate listens for the specified event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], not for an event on a specific element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Este método é estático e responde apenas se um delegado escuta para o evento especificado na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], não para um evento num elemento específico.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] can create broadcast listeners; therefore the per-element information is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]Pode criar serviços de escuta de difusão; Por conseguinte, as informações por elemento são irrelevantes.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> que indica se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] está à escuta para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> proxy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> proxy.

trans-unit.source: The class that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A classe que implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> proxy.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> proxy.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de automatização.

trans-unit.source: The proxy.
trans-unit.target: O proxy.

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> to raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Chamado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para aumentar o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raises an automation event.
trans-unit.target: Desencadeia um evento de automatização.

trans-unit.source: The event identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises an event to notify the automation client of a changed property value.
trans-unit.target: Desencadeia um evento para notificar o cliente de automatização de um valor de propriedade alterada.

trans-unit.source: The property that changed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The previous value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade anterior.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously resets the tree of child elements by calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>.
trans-unit.target: Em sincronia repõe a árvore de elementos subordinados chamando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method in certain peer implementations that change the set of child elements in response to a call to a control pattern interface.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método em determinadas implementações de ponto a ponto alterar o conjunto de elementos subordinados em resposta a uma chamada para uma interface de padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: An example is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>, which can change the child elements of the peer by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>, que pode alterar os elementos subordinados do elemento movendo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange> de</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Define o foco do teclado no elemento que está associado este ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>
